import { React,Fragment, useEffect, useState } from 'react' import classes from './Detail.module.css'; import demon from '../assets/demon.jpg' import sth from '../assets/demon-sm.jpg' import AnimeCharacter from './AnimeCharacter'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Recomand from './Recomand'; import Cast from './Cast'; import Axios from '../config/Axios'; export default function Detail(props) { console.log(props.anime); return (

{props.anime.name}

{props.language.map((lang)=>{ if(lang.id===props.anime.language_id){ return( {lang.name} ) } })}
{props.type.map((t)=>{ if(t.id===props.anime.type_id){ return( {t.name} ) } })} Episode 11 {props.anime.duration_time}/ep
Watch now Add to List
{props.anime.description}
Overview:
Tanjirou, Zenitsu, and Inosuke, aided by the Sound Hashira Tengen Uzui, travel to Yoshiwara red light district to hunt down a demon that has been terrorizing the town.
Director : Scores
Scores : Scores
Release : Scores
Release : Scores
Genres : {props.genre.map((g)=>{ return( {g.name} ) })}
Casts : {props.cast.map((c)=>{ return( {c.name} ) })}
{/* */}
) }
